author: Julia Alexander
title: YouTube creators figure out how to film during a pandemic
description: The coronavirus pandemic has caused every industry to shift how they approach work as people self-quarantine at home. For some YouTubers, that means drastic changes to their channels. For others, not much has actually changed.
content: On Scotty Sire’s YouTube channel, it doesn’t look like anything has changed. He does Q&As with friends, pranks his pals, and jokes around with them in his backyard — just about the same things he did before California required him to stay indoors since Sire a… [+5131 chars]
